subject: Re: [junit] Looking for the maintainer of the JUnit documentation.
msgSnippet: ... That document isn t really being maintained . It was written, and that s that. Since then, there are a number of new tutorials, guides and publications
messageBody:
Edouard Chevtchouk wrote:
>
>
> How can I reach the maintainer of this document ?
>
> http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/testinfected/testing.htm
>
> I beleive there is something in the content that might be interpreted
> improperly...

That document isn't really being "maintained". It was written, and
that's that. Since then, there are a number of new tutorials, guides and
publications about JUnit. I recommend searching the web and your local
bookstores for more. Start at junit.org or with Google.

By the way, what content are you concerned about? Perhaps we can help you.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
